content.text:
Recording some thoughts adjacent to %D+Zyr32df9TUiGr1no1Eqi1eBvENCusGekqTZqHk4sc=.sha256:

I wonder what would happen if we allocated one level instance per feed [with subleveldown](https://github.com/Level/subleveldown) and parsed `msg.value.content` as [level operations](https://github.com/level/levelup#dbbatcharray-options-callback-array-form).

Legacy message types would be assumed to be `type: 'put', key: msg.key, value: msg.value`, but this would give us both deletion *and* batch operations where one message could create multiple items in a feed-specific database.

ðŸ¤·
